EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Customer Stories: Citi, Volkswagen & Conversant
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Our mission is to transform how the world builds and runs software. I would like to share how three organisations are leveraging our cloud-native platform, advanced tools and software development methodology to deliver exceptional user experiences.
Hear from the digital transformation leaders:
- Citi Adopt Pivotal Cloud Foundry To Accelerate Transformation: https://pivotal.io/citi - Volkswagen Group Leverage Pivotal Labs to Drive Agile, Lean Application Development Methodologies: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8vT902N8UVE - Conversant Leverage Pivotal Greenplum to Bring Transparency to Online Advertising: https://pivotal.io/customers/conversant
I trust these use cases will help you make transformation real for your organisation.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
